sentences.sContent: The poncho is made of nylon.
sentences.sCn: 这雨披是用尼龙制造的。

sentences.sContent: Five year old Hank and father mother elder brother work together to the forest, suddenly began to rain, but they have only a quick poncho.
sentences.sContent_eng: Five year old Hank and father mother elder brother work together to the forest, suddenly began to rain, but they have only a quick poncho.
sentences.sCn: 五岁的汉克和爸爸妈妈哥哥一起到森林干活，突然间下起雨来，可是他们只带了一快雨披。

sentences.sContent: Sign up for the Cave of the Winds tour, which begins after you change into a complimentary yellow poncho and sandals (trust us, you'll need 'em).
sentences.sContent_eng: Sign up for the Cave of the Winds tour, which begins after you change into a complimentary yellow poncho and sandals (trust us, you'll need 'em).
sentences.sCn: 报名参加风之洞之旅吧，你将会获赠一个黄色雨披和一双凉拖（相信我，你会用得到）。

trans.tranOther: a type of coat consisting of one large piece of cloth, with a hole in the middle for your head
